Blog.post: hais ytd juz came back from malaysia, kuala terengganu, redang island so tired... muz tk bout more thn 10 hrs of bus back to singapore man so de tired... on our way back we stopped at 1 small restaurant some where in terengganu for our lunch.. u will regret when u eat ur lunch there man, coz while u eat u muz disply ur flappin kong fu as there r lotts of flies flyin around u. i eat as fast as i can liaox thn went back to de bus to escape from those flies..hahax. thn bout 3 hrs ltr we reach kuantan, de bus stop again n let us go to tandas( toilet ) hahax malay word lai de, there u can see some ting which we cant see in singapore, a fly paper. ya thn at de paper there r lotts of fly trapped on it sia so funny hahax, but when u look closely u can see some big hse fly trapped on it... After tt we tk bout 5 hrs of bus ride back to yong peng for our dine. on ou way to yong peng, we came across huge palm plantation sia.. so nice man, when u look at de plantation it is like endless coz it stretches few mountains from where u were.. at yong peng we eat our dine n went to de toilet n so on.. thn carry on our 2 hrs of bus ride to de malaysia check point.. at first i thought tt we go to de tuas checkpoint but in de end we went to de woodlands checkpoint. at de malaysian checkpoint nth reali happens to mi, but at woodlands checkpoint reali changed alot since 6 nth ago, after de ppl scan my passport i muz walk a big rounds thn reach de 2 x-ray machine to check ur bags n barang barang n 2 machine for checkin u for ani lethal weapons or metal things some thing like tt. after all tt i was suddenly asked to stop sia by a policeman, he asked me wad is in my pocket, thn i say my hp, he thn ask me to tk it out but when i gonna open my hp pouch, he say ok u may go.. scare mi sia.. after there i continue my journey to golden mile complex there liaox de final destination... i was so happy sia de whole bus left my family n my uncle's family.. thn i sit at de last row wif my cousin hahax.. when i was back i immediately meg de darlin hees, she de first person tt i meg..hees.. it was reali a veri tired dae man n de first time i had tk such a long journey on bus man!!!!

todae durin my chemistry lesson, so happy coz my chem tec back le but sad is she cant tec us yet. de relieve tec hor i say le makes my blood boil. de whole class wonders whenther she knows hor to tec chem nt sia. coz e ting she tec hor no 1 in e class understand, e answer, n many ting she tec us we onli have 1 word to describle, tt is DON UNDERSTAND. parents oso gt say if we don understand ask tec, but i so guai go ask e tec, but she nvr reply me, thn when she ask de class whether we understand nt, we say no thn she reply back veri gd lets carry on. siao de she,,, some more i veri guai sia carry on listein to her lesson, again i don even know what shit she writin on de board even those pro in chem de oso don understand... thn slowly i felt sleepy so hack e tec jus go slp, me n most of e class went to slp hahax, coz if we carry on listein to her lesson oso no use, ask her she won reply thn don even understand a shit of what she is teachin us... i slp till recess thn wake up, some more behind me is my tt sick chem tec sia.. can see from her face tt she understands y most of e class fell asleep, coz she too oso felt like wanna slp, n oso don know what she is teachin bout. hahax, its true.

ytd i received my report card, but my result was nt veri gd, hais but my english n chi has improve by a few marks, my social studies fail coz i have nt enough time to finish tt, last 2 que don understand wad they askin me about. chemistry n physic hais, chemistry is no hope liaox, physic is don know de formula well. principle of accounts, fail coz everi ppl in my class de tec add their poa online work into de report card except me, so i fail by 2 marks. hais but de tec told me tt my poa online work de marks will b add into my end of de yr marks. i onli have few simple wish only few veri simple wish: 1) hope tt u can recover from ur cough 2) can go out wif u but sadly, i cant go out wif u on sep 8 to 11. 3) can tok wif u on phone long may ur cough can recover fast. i love u minx, jus hearts min forever n this will remain forever muackz huggies.. miss u much =[ but love u deeply too^^

haix todae after recess while i am lining up. just bout to go back to class, de DM ask my class n 4N3 class to stay back, coz he ask de class chairperson to count n check who nvr come down to line up. thn my chairperson damm stupid de lor 1 of my classmate go home b4 recess thn he say tt he nvr come down thn in de end de whole class kan na. damm it man, thn de DM come to check our attire, so suay i was called out coz of my hair, stupid de sia, in de morning he oso come n check nth wrong thn recess check i was called out. sianz diao. i n 8 of my classmates tio sia, thn we go into de DM room to write down our names n get some scoldin. after tt, we went back to our class to have our lesson. when i reach home, i immediately change n go to de nearby barber to cut hair, coz de DM wanna check our hair tml morning b4 assembly. my 8 frens n i kan na this all thxs to my chairperson man!!! donno y he can b class's chairperson when he is so stupid. everi bodi in de class knows tt my tt fren who always come to sch thn go home durin recess, but onli he donno thn when i ask him bout this, he gives me a lame escuse, i don no coz no 1 come n tell or inform me bout this, so lame man, becoz of him we muz cut our hair wad de fuck is this man..... hate my class chairperson forever. GOD DAMM IT

sat was a fun dae mans, coz i tk over de unit, thn when doin PT( physical trainning ) i stand behind de cadets guide them hahax, so fun thn after tt we run around de neighbourhood, rest a while thn ply games, team bondin games. after de game, went to change thn go for muster parade lioax, after tt our sir brief us about IFC ( individual firld craft ) things, thn we been seperated into 4 goups teaching diff things on IFC. thn i teach de part Bs cadets bout field signals. hahax so cool mans, coz last time when we r nt takin over de unit we cant go to buy ani ting to drink or eat, thn after we tk over de part i can enjoy of buying drinks in front of de sir some more, cant blame me coz i teach till i damm thirsty. hahax. when goin to teach de last section, i waited for 10 mintes some ting, thn i go buy drinks n chat wif my frens hahax. after teaching de last section we pack our things thn rdy for our dismissal parade. after tt damm, our sir tell all part C meet him after de parade after this, sianz diao. but lucki it was a short debrief. thn he told us next week we gonna go some where in singapore for part B to tk their orienteering test thn ask us to go oso to guide them along. hahax. after de debrief i went home to rest but it was a fun dae after all. at home more sianz de whole com hang tio cant use it, thn suddenly my uncle called me thn he come to my hse to fix tt damm it com. but thn its nt my com siao its tt god damm it broad band coz de com to b so damm lag, coz de com kan na soooooooooo many virus, coz my hse phone cant call out n ppl cant call my hse, n etc. after tt, i n my family went to raffles place mrt interchange there to have my dine coz its my grand ma bdae. at there, i n daniel ply my aunty's hp thn ltr while eatin guess wad, i chat wif my dearest darlin on sms, oso tk my family photo. even we tk we oso muz tk turns cant blame us, coz my mum side de family is a big 1 mans can say tt my mum de family is a big family. after tt me n daniel walk around raffles place thn we went back eat bdae cake rest a while thn we went home. tt was a tired dae mans. sun: i wake up at 1158 thn went to watch tv msg to my darlin a while thn she went to tuition liaox. bout 2 some ting thn i msg her again thn oso de same , chat wif her a while nia, 2 some ting till now cant msg her coz she promise tt she will msg me when she is on de way home. hais long time nvr go out wif her liaox & my love sick s growing deeply n more dae my dae. i miss her lotts but oso love her deeply too hehex, everi moment of de dae no matter wad i do i at where, i cant stop thinking of her, n even when i slp, once i close my eyes i keep seeing her, thn when i deeply asleep, i keep sayin her name out non stop. hees. ani way i wanna say some ting to her, no matter how long we nvr go out together le, i still love u deeply. i will nt leave u but i will always stay by ur side lovin u ^^. i love u darlin 1314 & i will love u 3344. *muacks* * huggies*

sianz ar todae e lesson, but b4 tt was my physic test, damm it man some que so de diff cant reali do. hais sianz diao. after tt it was my PE lesson, but when we go down to e PE store outside le, thn e stupid chairperson told us tt e PE tec nvr come thn all sad sad go back to class... after we change back to our uniform, our maths tec come in as our relieve tec sia. de whole class hack her includin me too hahax, i ish ask my fren throw sweet to me, thn 1 of my fren so suay kan na caught eating sweet by her thn she like askin him to slpit out e sweet in his mouth but he don wanna, hahax so funni man some more she go ask him to find out who is e supplier of sweet sia. thn i was there tokin wif my fren bout gb de, after tt when she leaves e class, we went crazy man goin around e class some go e whole sch to find some ting to eat sia... hahax, durin our geography lesson our tec oso nvr come so happy man, thn e relieve tec told us tt our geo tec ask us to do quiz but nt open bk de, thn e quiz 1st que i donno how to do onli but others all know... hahax, e relieve tec so gd, she let us go late for recess thn told us tt by 11 muz come back to class. when recess over, i bought a big packet of keropok to class to eat hahax, some frens buy packet drinks sweets bread, u name it they gt all. thn we went crazy went around e class to eat here n there some more call our frens usin hp in front of de tec sia... hahax but so sianz so de miss her man!! hais, this few weeks she is so buzy cant go out wif her, hais... jus love min forever n this will remain forever n when i say this i mean it, i will prove to u darlin. jus tt so long nvr see ur cute n kawaii face le so de miss u, i miss u so much even my words cant describle it, reali miss oso loves u deeply wif all my heat darlin... wad i say is true wad i say i mean it wad i say will remain forever wad i say i will nt break it as i am nt those ppl who loves to break promise darlin dearx miss u so much till everi moment when i close my eyes i can see u, everi moment my heart is thinking of u, darlin hope we can go out together asap ya? cant wait to see how cute chio n kawaii my darlin is le woo hoo. hehex,
